name: Zenonia 4
summary: A continuation of legendary adventures from a series of games Zenonia. In this game there all best advantages of last versions - a huge number of monsters and objects, an excellent subject plan of the game and a gameplay. Rescue the queen, struggle with constantly approaching evil to preserve good and justice in this mad world. Pass many interesting levels, develop your hero and choose the best strategy for world rescue. In the game there is good graphics, a good soundtrack and three levels of difficulty.
